mapper.update: update examinfo set exam_name = #{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paper_code = #{paperCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, exam_name, paper_code, begin_time, end_time, duration from examinfo
